item.description:
I am turning my idea into a formal event so please RSVP Yes only if you know you will be there. I've never been to the ICA before so I will stand near the doors where I can be seen easily. I don't have a Meetup badge but I will be wearing a "Meetup red" peacoat and I look like my picture, so I should be pretty easy to spot. If I don't see you come and introduce yourself to me.

I understand there will be a free tour from the lobby (I have not personally confirmed this) and we can either tag along or do our own thing. A sizeable group from Social Fun will be there also. They have plans to go out afterward for a bite to eat and something to drink. We can each decide how we'd like our evening to end.

Hope to see you there!

http://www.icaboston....
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the lobby wearing a red peacoat and I look like my picture.
item.name: Free Thursday at the Institute of Contemporary Art
